name: Peach
baseMeaning: A fuzzy pink fruit with a stem and leaf.
tldr: Almost never means the fruit. Usually refers to a butt/booty.

contextMeanings.meaning: Refers to a butt or backside (due to shape resemblance).
In inappropriate contexts can be harassment.

platformNotes.note: Very common on fitness and selfie posts referring to glutes.
Used in body-positive content and fitness videos.
Avoid entirely - almost always inappropriate for work.

generationalNotes.note: Same understanding - almost never means the fruit.
May actually use to refer to peaches. Careful in responses.

warnings.title: Suggestive meaning
warnings.description: This emoji almost universally refers to a butt, not fruit. Can be seen as inappropriate or objectifying.
